org.openimaj.image.processing.resize

Class BicubicInterpolation

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.image.processing.resize.BicubicInterpolation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ImageProcessor<FImage>, Processor<FImage>, SinglebandImageProcessor<Float,FImage>

    public class BicubicInterpolation
extends Object
implements SinglebandImageProcessor<Float,FImage>
    Bi-cubic interpolation to resize images.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

    • Constructor Detail

      • BicubicInterpolation

        public BicubicInterpolation(int width,
                            int height,
                            float scale)
        Construct a new bicubic interpolator. The parameters describe the width and height of the generated image, together with the scale that goes FROM the NEW image TO the ORIGINAL.
        Parameters:
        width - new width.
        height - new height.
        scale - scaling from new size to original.

    • Method Detail

      • processImage

        public void processImage(FImage image)
        Description copied from interface: ImageProcessor
        Process an image. Implementing classes must alter the image passed in-place or assign the output to the input using Image.internalAssign(Image).
        Specified by:
        processImage in interface ImageProcessor<FImage>
        Parameters:
        image - The image to process in place.
